mapper.select: select * from payment order by pay_id desc
select CASE WHEN cid IS NOT NULL THEN cid WHEN sid IS NOT NULL THEN sid Else '' END AS result from payment where imp_uid = #{impUid}
mapper.insert: insert into payment (sid, cid, imp_uid, merchant_uid, pname, buyer_name, buyer_tel, pstatus, paid_amount, paid_at, vbank_name, vbank_num, vbank_holder) values (#{sid}, #{cid}, #{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{pname}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerTel}, #{pstatus}, #{paidAmount}, #{paidAt}, #{vbankName}, #{vbankNum}, #{vbankHolder})
